template.description: This template gets the flights/airports/airlines from the Chroma API through a polling system, filters the incoming data, transform them to NGSIV2 entities, and sends them to Orion.
template.name: Chroma-NGSI-Orion

config.comments: Build some attributes related to the airport entity (AirportDisplayName, AirportName)
Segregate all incoming airlines
Build flight entity with NGSIv2 format
Filter all the flights with ScheduledDateTime not null
Filter all the airlines with AirlineCodeIATAnot null
Polling airport endpoint from Chroma API every day

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

config.comments: Save airport entity in Orion Context Broker

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

config.comments: Polling airline endpoint from Chroma API every day

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

config.comments: Build some attributes related to the flight entity (arrivesToAirport, belongsToAirline, departsFromAirport)
Build some attributes related to the airline entity (AirlineName)
Get some entitie attributes for future processing (AirlineIATA, DepartureArrivalType, OriginDestAirportIATA, ScheduledDateTime)
Get some entitie attributes for future processing (AirlineCodeIATA, AirlineName)
Save flight entity in Orion Context Broker

Save airline entity in Orion Context Broker
